item.description:
Facilitator: Jim Rose, M.Ed., vice president Johnson & Johnson (ret.)

Through a series of exercises and discussions, Jim will show you how meditation can be an effective tool for being more in control of your life, being able to appreciate the significance of each moment and uncovering the wisdom deep inside you. Learn and practice a powerful meditation technique that enables you to connect with the consciousness already within you.

On-street parking. The Center requests that we do not park in the driveway.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be introducing the speaker.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Meditation and Conscious Living -- An interactive workshop
